'''Notes'''
Overall nice laptop for Linux, although suspend and hibernation doesn't work at all. Also volume buttons stopped working in this release (they were fine in 10.10). Suspend and hibernation didn't also work in previous version of Ubuntu which this laptop run. Web cam and internal microphone now works fine.
